Posts.Content: May 28, 2019 01:10AM Judvan2 wrote: Thank you so much for writing. I agree, they don't know long term effects of a lot of this disease, probably because of so many new treatments. I'm on 60 mg. of prednisone down to 20 in 21 days, crazy. its been three weeks and its still red and hot. They did a punch biopsy and it was negative. My oncologist said she will do mammo, MRI and anothe biopsy if it doesnt clear up. Thank you for all your ideas, I will mention each one. It feels so much better to find someone who has experienced this. Have a great day!!
Posts.Title: Radiation recall Judvan2 Judvan2

Posts.Content: May 27, 2019 11:21AM Judvan2 wrote: Thank you for sharing with me. I got this three weeks ago and my breast is still red, and sensitive, They are treating me with large doses of prednisone after 10 days of antibiotics. How long did it take to clear and how long after your radiation was compleed did you get it.. Thanks so much. Judy
